MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK10 postcode area of Alloa, affecting properties in Charles Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:46am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to install generators affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:20am on the 28th of April 2021
